meanings.sent1: She packed all her personalty in boxes before moving.
meanings.sent2: He made sure to label all his personalty to keep track of them.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to claim the new toy as part of its personalty.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of vintage records was her most cherished personalty.
meanings.sent5: The personalty of the nomadic tribe consisted of tents and cooking utensils.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being a person.
meanings.sent1: Kindness and empathy are important aspects of one's personalty.
meanings.sent2: His warm smile reflected his friendly personalty.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to mimic human personalty traits with mixed results.
meanings.sent4: Her adventurous spirit was a key part of her vibrant personalty.
meanings.sent5: The artist's unique personalty shone through in every brushstroke.
